description: Iteration 5 policy: slightly tighter liquidity discipline while preserving zero delay and full settlement. Symmetric rules for both banks; no collateral trees used because collateral cost is zero.

on_true.description: Release urgent or overdue payments immediately to avoid any chance of deadline or EOD penalties.
Release when there is enough effective liquidity including buffer.

on_false.description: Briefly hold only non‑urgent payments when liquidity is insufficient; they will be released as they become urgent or liquidity improves.
For non‑urgent payments, require effective_liquidity to cover amount with a modest safety buffer to limit overdrafts while keeping delay near zero.

payment_tree.description: Always release if payment is urgent or past deadline, otherwise check liquidity.

bank_tree.description: No dynamic bank‑level controls; rely on payment‑level logic.

strategic_collateral_tree.description: Do not post or withdraw collateral strategically because collateral cost is zero and RTGS credit is cheap relative to delay penalties in this configuration.
